pages.text:
Priscilla's Story
​
Contact Priscilla:
livemusicstuart@gmail.com
or 561 320 7894 voicemail line
Priscilla Speicher is a HUGE music lover (all kinds!) She had a 27-year career in advertising, marketing and promotional writing in South Florida before moving to Stuart, where she owned and operated NOTES MUSIC ROOM for 3 years -- but Covid ended the magic and she started spending time in Fort Pierce. She moved here, and was thrilled and DELIGHTED to bring that same special vibe, positive atmosphere and "musical family" to the Fort! She operated HARMONY MUSIC LOUNGE in Downtown Ft. Pierce for 3 years, and it was beloved by many! But ultimately, it was difficult to pay the rent off-season, and she was denied a lease renewal. Ever the optimist, she believes all is meant to be, and that new adventures and a new purpose await. She seeks to not only help and support musicians and artists of all kinds with her endeavors, but to also make sure that her works aid the homeless and mentally ill.
​
"
MUSIC
is my heart. My soul. My energy, my solace, my joy, my passion, my greatest love. All genres, all styles, I appreciate and embrace it all -- and the people who make it. I want to devote my time, energy, resources, and life to: --Bringing all sorts of music to people and giving them a special, wonderful musical experience; --Meeting, encouraging, supporting, energizing, nurturing, exposing and promoting new talent and youth as well as older, highly experienced musicians that only gig occasionally and have difficulty finding venues. And  --Concepting, creating and executing unique music-themed
special events
. And honestly, as much as I hated to give up Harmony Music Lounge, it was a TRULY AMAZING time period and experience in my life--- It had an energy and a way of being that doesn't exist elsewhere. I am proud of what I accomplished at HARMONY Lounge, with the help of my right-hand man and sound engineer, David Donovan. Now, I'm committed to HARMONY MUSIC EVENTS, untilziing other venues. Please Like and Follow my
FB page
and
Instagram
and
THANK YOU to every person who has ever attended one of my events
, danced, clapped, tapped your toes, or tipped the musicians. YOU are why I keep doing this! I'm so thankful and excited to continue bringing you
uncommon, exceptional live entertainment and events!"
​
Priscilla has worked side jobs in the Hospitality Industry her entire life. Her career in Journalism and Writing led her to become an award-winning writer for Advertising, Marketing, and PR firms and agencies. She has held Marketing Director positions and operated her own successful Marketing Agency in Delray Beach for 6 years. Priscilla loves writing and especially creating content, taglines and logos. She has always loved waiting on people and bartending. Thank you for following her events and career.
"EXPECT DIFFERENT."
Harmony Events On Facebook
PRISCILLA'S TWITTER

livemusicstuart@gmail.com

Have an EVENT you need HELP WITH?
Consider improving & enhancing your event with one of these services.
Rates are affordable, Quotes are Free.
Serving Stuart, Port St. Lucie, St. Lucie West, Fort Pierce, and Vero Beach and all of the Treasure Coast.
Event Services & Entertainment
Your event is in great hands with Harmony! Owner Priscilla has 35 years of career experience in Marketing, Advertising, & Events. She has owned and operated a small ad agency and 2 live music venues. She has planned and executed 40+ weddings and more than 2500 events. And she is here to help! (LOVES to help, actually! :-)
MC / Hostess / Greeter
Priscilla is an exceptional Master of Ceremonies, and can make sure all your announcements get made, news gets shared, and sponsors / VIPS get recognized. Raffles? No problem! Greeting every guest is important! And a formal hostess...priceless!
Event Planning, F & B Server
Whether you need full planning soup to nuts, or an event assistant the day of, or simply need help with Food and Bar service - contact Priscilla. It can mean the difference between a so-so event or one that you and your guests truly enjoy!
PS - Event Promotion is also offered. It costs nothing to inquire! :)
Entertainment, Bands, DJs
From owning Notes Music Room in Stuart and Harmony Music Lounge in Ft. Pierce, Priscilla of Harmony Music Events has hundreds of musicians in her circles. She also sings as a solo vocalist, and with a duo or full band. She's happy to refer the perfect entertainers for your wishes. Just ask!
Coming Soon - List of Acts

Visit this page often for
UNCOMMON, QUALITY ENTERTAINMENT around the Treasure Coast
& bless your heart for doing so! :)
SCROLL DOWN TO SEE ALL OF PRISCILLA'S EVENTS. Please Read Details. For events with advance ticket sales, it's OK to pay at the event. Thank you for inviting friends and supporting live entertainment!
All American Wednesdays in Stuart
Mini Concerts Live Music takes place EVERY Weds. and it's always on the softer side!
Themed Thursdays SPECIAL SHOWS every Week - Stuart
Priscilla is hosting Thurs. nites at Terra Fermata and promising EXCEPTIONAL music acts and less commonly heard styles of music. You'll enjoy it and your ears will love it! :)  Can't thank you enuff for telling others about it, help make this THE place to be on Thursday evenings in Martin County!  7-10 Showtime each week
Monthly BLUES/ ROCK / JAZZ JAM IN STUART
Always the 2nd Thurs. - Always open to musicians and singers to join in! Come relax and hear a great show at Terra Fermata, 26 SE 6th St.  7-10 PM showtime   $5 Cover goes to the musicians
POP & DANCE MUSIC every 3rd Thurs. of the month at Terra Fermata in Stuart, FL
Come enjoy various performers once a month doing Pop  Disco  Dance hits! $5 cover   7-10 PM show
ROCK THRU THE AGES Tribute to all the Great Bands - Aug 23rd
AN INCREDIBLE SHOW, BACK BY DEMAND! 7 - 10 PM AT TERRA FERMATA  TICKET & Details LINK BELOW Just $8
SAXY DUO Ed & Debbie VARIETY SHOW - Jazz, Soft Rock, Classics. 7-10 PM Aug. 28  Terra Fermata
Terra Fermata Themed Thursdays hosted by Priscilla - (4th Thursdays always feature SAXOPHONISTS) Only a $5 Cover   Outside Food OK but NO outside bevs or cups allowed   Casual Fun Venue
Jazz Show in Fort Pierce Sept. 26 - CELEBRATION OF TWO LOCAL LEGENDS in Jazz  Jim Van Voorheis & Taddy Mowatt  Sept. 26 in Fort Pierce
The Black Box is a fantastic place to see a show! And this show is just $12 advance (sunrisetheatre.com) or $15 at door. Celebrate these two long time local jazz musicians and they'll have plenty of guest performers as well! It will be an evening to remember. Part of the LATE NIGHT LOUNGE SERIES OF MONTHLY CONCERTS that Priscilla hosts at this venue. Watch for the Oct. event announcement coming soon! DOORS OPEN 7:45 FOR AN 8:15 PM START - Show and Bar goes til 11 PM   Thank you for inviting friends!
YOU'RE INVITED! Short Vid about Weds. nite Shows!
Live Music in Stuart, FL every single Weds. evening and always wholesome! :)
BLUEGRASS Trio SEPT. 3 in Stuart, FL
The Bluegrass Messengers pickin and pluckin! Americana favorites too! Terra Fermata, Stuart
ROLLING STONES TRIBUTE SEPT. 4 in Stuart
Don't miss a great show! $7 Cover Charge at Door for THE STONES CLONES So good, so fun, bring your own FOOD! 7 - 10 PM show, Terra Fermata, Stuart
Jason Aldean & Luke Bryan Tribute!  followed by hot country band Heidi Merrill
Two great shows in one! Aug. 22 at Terra Fermata  Get tix at TerraFermata.com or pay at door
Oct. 12 - Phenomenal Band from Broward County RNB / SOUL with JAM-X, in Stuart
FANTASTICALLY GOOD SHOW COMING you don't want to miss this - Ticket link coming soon  $6 advance or $9 at door   Terra Fermata Tiki Bar & Garden
Advertise Your Biz inexpensively
List of Eateries & Entertainment Spots, Ft. Pierce
This website, created by Priscilla, describes and lists the areas and retailers that make Fort Pierce a FANTASTIC place to spend a day, evening or weekend!
POP & DANCE Music every 3rd Thurs. in Stuart. Sept. 18 Funktion Junktion Trio
OK to bring in food. NO outside beverages allowed. $5 cover charge. Always a great time!  Terra Fermata Tiki Bar & Garden, Stuart FL.
ALL AMERICAN WEDS. SCHEDULE
​
​
​
​
AUG. 20: TIM BOTTRELL AND FRIENDS Acoustic Show, from Soft Rock to Americana
AUG. 27:  THE LITTLE THINGS TRIO - Harmonies and Songs you will be delighted by!
Sept. 3:   BLUEGRASS MESSENGERS  Plucky Grassy Trio w/ banjo
Sept. 10:  The Old Hippies - so many great beloved songs!
Sept. 17:   Bob Walker solo - soft and tropical favorites
All shows 7-10pm @ Terra Fermata, 26 SE 6th ST. Stuart - Priscilla is your bartender :)
​
NOTE: To see many more Entertainment events all around the Treasure Coast,
visit this FB page and simply scroll!
​
RETURN TO HOME PAGE
